patthana18.14:1.1_0: Sappaccayaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:2.1_0: Sappaccayaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaccayo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:3.1_0: Anidassanaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassano nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana18.14:4.1_0: Anidassanaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassano nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:5.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana18.14:6.1_0: Appaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:7.1_0: Arūpiṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana18.14:8.1_0: Rūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.14:9.1_0: Arūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi,
patthana18.14:9.1_1: adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.14:10.1_0: Lokiyaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana18.14:11.1_0: Lokuttaraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.14:12.1_0: Lokiyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana18.14:13.1_0: Lokuttaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokiyo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana18.14:14.1_0: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.14:15.1_0: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.14:16.1_0: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuñca nakenaci viññeyyaṁ hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.14:17.1_0: Kenaci viññeyyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakenaci viññeyyo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
